case.state: Hello, everyone! I can’t wait to see what you all have to give to me!
Oooooh, you all look soooo big! I like that!
Don’t forget to lock the door! Hahaha!
Make sure we can be nice and private for this!
Changes the label to "Tony".
Can you give it to me better, dealer?
Oh, I need something special from you, dealer!
Give it all to me! I need more!
Oh boy, I need a lot!
Ohhhh, I need two at once!
Ohhhh, I need two at once!
Four at once? Oooh, can I handle it?
Don't put those into me! They might clog my plumbing!
Ohhhh yes! I love having something this good in my hands!
Are you ready to pull your pants down for me?
Ohhhh, I’m getting excited already!
Oh, yes! I can’t wait to see more of you!
Oooohh yeeeaaahh, I’m going to be filled to the brim!
Yes, please! I want every last piece!
Mmm! I’m already aching to get closer to you all!
Well? Are you ready to share your loads with me?
Just being here with you is so fun! But we can make it even more fun!
Don’t worry, I won’t peek! Not unless you want me to!
I won’t look at what you have yet! I’m a good friend!
Uh-oh! This looks pretty compromising!
Oops! Guess I shouldn’t have thrown that one down me! Haha!
Ohhhh, now this isn’t the kind of stinker I like to see!
Whoopsies! I might be the one taking it hard this time!
Ohhhh boy! I have a feeling you’re about to top me!
Oopsies! That was a big boo-boo!
Whoopsy-daisy! Guess I made a mistake!
Looks like I’m the one who made an accident this time!
Oh no! I’m absolutely helpless before you!
Wow! I’m used to people being on top of me, but this is unexpected!
*THUMP*
*BUMP*
*THUNK*
*WHACK*
Don’t worry! We won’t need that until I’m all nice and dirty from you!
Your daddy uses that to help take care of me! You have such a good daddy, don’t you?
Don’t forget to grab that later, ~player~! It’s important you stay clean, too!
Remember, ~player~, don’t forget that paper after you’re done using me!
Mmm! That cleaner tastes sooooo good!
Oh, that cleaner’s delicious! I love feeling it drip down into me!
Oh, I love that plunger! It can get sooooo deep inside me!
That plunger cleans my dirtiest parts! I love how it feels!
Come on, sport! There’s no need to be shy!
I’m your friend, buddy! And friends share things together!
Don’t feel uncomfortable, ~name~! This is special!
Ohh, ~name~! It’s time you pay your part!
It’s time, ~name~! Just like we practiced!
Yes, yes! I’m waiting for what you've got for me!
I hope you’re playing nicely with your brother! Daddy wants his boys to take care of each other!
Come on, honey! You don’t have to be scared!
I’m your friend, sweetie! And friends share special things together!
Don’t feel uncomfortable, ~name~! This is special!
Ohh, ~name~! It’s time you pay your part!
It’s time, ~name~! Just like we practiced!
Your turn, ~name~! I want you to give me your all!
Oh yeeeeaaaaah! I’m excited to see what ~name~ is gonna give me!
[Note from the authors: we’re very sorry for what we’ve done, but we would 100% do it again given the chance.]
That's great! Even more, ~target~!
I believe in you, ~name~! Let’s do it together!
I really like the way you do it, ~name~! That’s right!
Come on, big boy, keep going!
Nice going, ~target~! That's really good!
Oh, that was real good! Ready to do it some more?
Mmmmm, that’s right! Keep it up, ~name~!
Oh, we’re just getting started! ~name~ is a big boy-- he must have waaaayy more to give me!
You're making me proud! Keep going!
Don’t stop now, sweetie!
Ohhhh, you’re doing so good!
I need to be filled up as much as you can! Let’s see what you can do!
That's what I want to see!
Oooooh yeah, I like that! Great work, honeypie!
Aww, thanks, sweetie! But that was only a little bit! Can you squeak out some more soon?
That’s okay for now, but I want even more! I believe in you, ~name~!
Haha! ~name~ is going to do great! Give me what you’ve got! Oh yeah!
Look at you go! You're doing soooo good!
Help me help you! Give me even more!
I want more! I need more! Oooohh yeah!
That's great! Keep it coming!
Big boys let out lots! Keep it coming!
Oh ho ho! You’re doing great! I can’t wait for more!
Nice job! High five!
You can do it! I want everything you've got!
That’s how you do it! Even more!
Don’t hold back, honey! Just like that!
I want it! I need it! Let me have it aaaaaalll!
There they go!
Yes, yes, yes! You’re doing great!
Oooooohh yeessss! You’re making Daddy proud!
If Mommy was here, she’d be watching you closely and beaming with pride!
If you still have more, let it out!
You’re letting out a big one, aren’t you? Oh boy!
More! More! Keep it coming!
So good! Mommy is proud of you, too!
Come on, let me have even more!
Ohhh, I can tell this is a big one!
Mmmmm! I’m sooo excited to get something big!
Nice work! Give me more!
That's my girl! Give me even more!
Sooooo good! Two thumbs up!
Ooooh! I’m eagerly awaiting what’s next! Aaaaaahhhh!
I reeeealllly want to see what a big, strong boy like you has to give me! Oooooh! Aaaaaahh!
Gosh, you're doing such a great job! You're so big and strong!
Gosh, you're big! You're sooo big! My goodness, look at you!
You’re so handsome! You’ll be looking like your daddy in no time!
Oh yeeeeaah! Bring it out and let’s go!
Don’t leave your gonchies in the way! You’ve got work to do!
Take your undies off and let’s go! Oh yeah~!
Make sure to aim correctly!
Don’t miss! That’ll take a long time to clean up! Mommy and Daddy will be sad!
You’re growing up so fast! Great job!
Daddy’s big boy is making him proud!
Oh, you’ve grown soooo much, champ!
Wow, buddy! I can’t believe how much you’ve grown!
Come on, honeypie! Let’s see how much you’ve grown!
Aww, you’re still daddy’s little princess!
Great job! You're a growing girl!
Oh, you’ve grown soooo much, sweetie!
Aww! I’m sure mommy is proud of you too!
You can use a cushion on the seat if that makes you more comfortable! Ohh!
Pull those down and let’s get to work!
Those will just get in the way! You can do it!
If you sit right on me, Daddy will have a special treat for you!
You’re growing into a beautiful young lady - just like your mommy!
Hold on tight, ~target~! I wanna see you give your all!
Big boys who do as they’re told get special surprises! Put everything you have in me!
Remember not to pull on the handle too hard-- you could break it!
Put it straight into me! I want everything you have!
Mmmmm, that’s how I like it! I neeeeeed you to let out lots, champ!
Daddy loves it when you work hard like that, buddy!
Let it aaaaalll out! I want all you’ve got, sport!
Imagine Mommy’s watching you! She’d be so proud!
Let out everything you have! Mommy will be impressed the more you put in me!
Don’t fidget too much-- you might fall over!
Oh yeah, let it aaaall out! I need it!
I need even more, ~target~! Don't let up!
Fill me up, ~target~! Put it in me!
Mmmmm! Nice!
Ooooohh! Aaaaahh! There’s soooo much! You did sooooo good!
Time to sit on me!
Make sure the lid is face-up when you take a seat!
I love it when good girls sit on me! Step right up!
Don’t be shy! Get on top of me and let it go!
Let’s see those rosy cheeks get to work!
Let it all out! You're doing great!
Remember to stroke from front to back!
Daddy likes what he sees!
There’s a special reward at the end if you’re good! I can’t wait!
That’s how it’s done! You’ve got so much of Mommy in you!
If you’re good, maybe Daddy will let you play on the Slip ‘N Slide tomorrow!
Oooooohh, look at ~name~ go! That’s how big girls do it!
Mmmmm, that’s good! That’s reeeallly good! Daddy will be happy!
Good job! Big girls love to show off what they can do!
Daddy loves his little sweetheart even more when she does sooooo good!
Get ready for the splash! Ooooohh!
You’re doing so good! Let’s see a big splash!
Give it to me, ~target~! I want it aaallll! Mmmm! Aaaahh!
Don’t forget to wipe up afterward!
Oh, yeah. That's the way!
If that’s all you have, good! Let’s take care of it!
You’ve done great! Time to send it all down!
Stand back or you might get hit!
Watch it go down with me! You’ve earned it!
Great work! I’ve got a lot to get rid of!
You did so good! There’s so much to flush!
Look at it go! Wheeeeee!
Round and round it goes!
Aren’t you proud of what you’ve done? You should be!
All your hard work on display! Look at it gooooo!
You put so much in me! I love it!
Woosh
[Sensual flushing noises]
Glug, glug, glug
Remember to wash your hands reeeaaally good now! You’ve done sooooo good!
You’ve done such a great job! Mommy and Daddy are gonna give you so many hugs and kisses!
Do you need to go again? Hop on!
Remember not to drink too much lemonade! You’ll need to visit me again real soon if you do!
Maybe Mommy will let you lick the beaters if she’s baking today! I know how much you love that yummy white stuff!
Maybe Daddy and you can wrestle later! Daddy will probably make you cry uncle!
Mmmmm! Everything I got was soooooo good!
Show off to Mommy and Daddy how much you put in me!
Since you’ve given me so much, maybe you and Daddy can read The Giving Tree today!
Manufactured by Helping Hand Industries in Albuquerque, New Mexico. Thank you for purchasing.
Unlocks the end_of_eva collectible.
End of playlist reached. Please hit the restart button.
Unlocks the end_of_eva collectible.

epilogue.hint: Win a game against Tony the Toilet Buddy. Even if it kills you.
epilogue.title: The Big Twist

scene.name: Part 1
scene.directive: A few minutes later...

scene.name: Part 3
scene.directive: Great job, sport! You filled me up so good!

scene.name: Part 4
scene.directive: Great job, sport! You filled me up so good!
I'm proud of you, and daddy is too!

scene.name: Part 5
scene.directive: But... I haven't been an entirely good toilet to you.

scene.name: Part 6
scene.directive: But... I haven't been an entirely good toilet to you.
I've been a bit of a fibber.

scene.name: Part 7
scene.directive: But... I haven't been an entirely good toilet to you.
I've been a bit of a fibber.
And that wasn't right - sometimes grown-ups fib about things to help others, but other times, they fib for themselves.

scene.name: Part 8
scene.directive: That's what I did, and I really shouldn't have. I'm so sorry!

scene.name: Part 9
scene.directive: That's what I did, and I really shouldn't have. I'm so sorry!
The only way I can make it up to you now is by showing you the truth!

scene.name: Part 10
scene.directive: That's what I did, and I really shouldn't have. I'm so sorry!
The only way I can make it up to you now is by showing you the truth!
Showing you who I really am!

scene.name: Part 11
scene.directive: Are you ready?

scene.name: Part 12
scene.directive: Are you ready?
Close your eyes...

scene.name: Part 14
scene.directive: Okay, sweetie! You can look now!

scene.name: Part 12
scene.directive: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3ejAMB3g_b8&ab_channel=MlpArmando
